translation.en: ♪ Super Monsters Super Monsters ♪
♪ Super Monsters ♪
♪ We're Super Monsters We're human in the daylight ♪
translation.es: Los Supermonstruos Humanos de día somos

translation.en: ♪ We're Super Monsters We become monsters at night ♪
translation.es: Los Supermonstruos Nos convertimos de noche

translation.en: ♪ Sun down Monsters up! ♪
♪ Here with my friends ♪
translation.es: Aquí con mis amigos MELODÍA DE LUNA

translation.en: ♪ Working together we have fun Come give a hand ♪
♪ That is the way we get things done ♪
♪ Working together We're Super Monsters, here we come ♪
translation.es: Trabajamos juntos Somos Supermonstruos, aquí vamos

translation.en: ♪ Growing together, we work and play That's how we get things done ♪
translation.es: Crecemos juntos Trabajamos y jugamos Así hacemos las cosas

translation.en: ♪ Done, done, done, done, done ♪
translation.es: Trabajamos y jugamos Así hacemos las cosas

translation.en: That was great! Everyone was on key and we remembered all the words!
translation.es: Estuvo genial. Nadie desafinó, y recordamos la letra.

translation.en: Now I just have to remember the dance steps.
translation.es: Ahora hay que recordar los pasos.

translation.en: Don't worry, Frankie. You've got this.
Victoria definitely agrees with you.
Victoria, your music is going to make this the best Blue Moon celebration ever.
translation.es: Victoria, tu música hará que esta fiesta de luna azul sea la mejor.

translation.en: I like that.
Now that we've practiced our Working Together song,
it's time to work together and make the programs for our concert.
translation.es: Ahora trabajemos en los programas del concierto.

translation.en: That's an excellent plan, Lobo.
We definitely need programs for tonight.
But first, there's something else we need to do.
translation.es: Pero primero hay que hacer otra cosa.

translation.en: Sun down!
Monsters up!
Drac!
Katya.
Lobo!
Zoe.
Frankie!
Cleo!
Spike!
Vida!
Super Monsters!
I can't wait to sing for our parents tonight.
translation.es: Ya quiero cantar para nuestros padres.

translation.en: Every monster loves to celebrate the Blue Moon.
translation.es: Todos adoramos festejar la luna azul.

translation.en: Especially this monster!
I made a poster for the concert. What do you think?
translation.es: Hice un póster para el concierto. ¿Qué opinan?

translation.en: - - Very good.
We should make the cover of our programs look like Zoe's poster.
translation.es: Usemos el póster como tapa de los programas.

translation.en: Great idea, Drac.
Magic wind, blow with care. Make the poster float on air.
translation.es: Viento mágico, sopla con cuidado Que este póster flote

translation.en: ♪ Here with my friends ♪
♪ Working together we have fun Come give a hand ♪
♪ That is the way we get things done ♪
♪ Working together, we're Super Monsters Here we come ♪
translation.es: Trabajamos juntos Somos Supermonstruos, aquí vamos

translation.en: ♪ Growing together, we work and play That's how we get things done ♪ ♪ Done, done, done, done, done ♪
translation.es: Crecemos juntos, trabajamos y jugamos Así hacemos las cosas

translation.en: Goodness. These programs look wonderful.
We put our pictures inside so the audience knows who's in the show.
translation.es: Pusimos fotos dentro para que sepan quién actúa.

translation.en: see that the programs also lists all of the songs you're performing tonight.
translation.es: El programa presenta todas las canciones de esta noche.

translation.en: Well done, kiddoes.
Perfect. We have a program for everyone who's coming tonight.
translation.es: Perfecto. Tenemos uno para todos los presentes.

translation.en: I made one extra.
Come on, Molasses! Let's deliver it. Fast, fast, fast, fast.
Here Victoria. I made this just for you.
Thank you for helping us perform tonight. This is going to be fang- tastic!
translation.es: Gracias a ti por ayudarnos. ¡Esto será fan-tástico!

translation.en: You're right, Victoria.
We do need to practice the soapy song one more time. I'll go get everyone.
translation.es: Debemos practicar la canción jabonosa. ¡Buscaré a todos!

translation.en: ♪ Bring on the bubbles And monster- fun ♪
♪ It's super soapy bath time For everyone ♪
♪ Monster size suds Is where we want to be ♪
♪ It's splash time, laugh time Super- soapy bath time ♪
translation.es: Hora de chapotear, de reír Del baño superjabonoso

translation.en: - ♪ Super Monsters love to get... ♪ -
I guess I got a little carried away. Sorry. Victoria, can we start over?
translation.es: Me entusiasmé un poco. Perdón. Victoria, ¿vamos de nuevo?

translation.en: - ♪ Bring on the bubbles ♪ -
translation.es: Sí, sí, sí Que haya burbujas...

translation.en: Lobo, do you feel OK?
I feel fine. But whenever I try to sing,
translation.es: - Lobo, ¿te sientes bien? - Sí. Pero cuando quiero cantar, la luna azul me hace...

translation.en: the Blue Moon makes me howl.
translation.es: Pero cuando quiero cantar, la luna azul me hace...

translation.en: That didn't happen during the last Blue Moon.
translation.es: No te pasó en la última luna azul.

translation.en: Every Blue Moon is different.
That means that the blue moon's magic is different too.
translation.es: O sea que su magia es distinta también.

translation.en: Especially if you're werewolves.
Maybe if we could block its rays?
That's a great idea, Vida.
Uh... Mega- size!
Thanks, Frankie.
- ♪ Bring on the bubbles ♪ -
It's no use. I can't control my howling when I sing!
translation.es: No hay caso, ¡no puedo controlar mi aullido!

translation.en: Maybe you can't sing, but you can still dance.
translation.es: Quizá no puedas cantar, pero sí bailar.

translation.en: You're right, Zoe. Drac, will you switch places with me?
Absolutely.
♪ Bring on the bubbles And monster- fun ♪
♪ It's super soapy bath time For everyone ♪
♪ Monster sized suds Is where we want to be ♪
♪ It's splash time, laugh time Super- soapy bath time ♪
translation.es: Hora de chapotear, de reír Del baño superjabonoso

translation.en: Super Monsters! We have to...
...catch that bathtub!
Goodness.
I'm so sorry, everybody. This is all my fault.
translation.es: Lo siento mucho. Todo esto es mi culpa.

translation.en: Igor, Esmi... I don't think I can be in the show.
translation.es: Igor, Esmie, no puedo estar en el espectáculo.

translation.en: Lobo, you can't go. This concert was your idea.
translation.es: - Lobo, no puedes irte. - Esto fue tu idea.

translation.en: You worked so hard helping us rehearse.
We've all worked hard to practice for tonight.
But if I stay, I'll ruin it for everybody.
translation.es: pero si me quedo, lo arruinaré todo.

translation.en: You know what, Lobo? You and the other Super Monsters
translation.es: Lobo, tú y los otros Supermonstruos son habilidosos

translation.en: are so good at finding solutions
translation.es: Lobo, tú y los otros Supermonstruos son habilidosos para solucionar problemas.

translation.en: to difficult problems.
Maybe there's a solution to this problem too, if you try.
♪ Working together ♪
We'd better do it fast. The audience will be here soon.
translation.es: Que sea rápido. La gente llegará pronto.

translation.en: Come on, everybody. I have an idea.
Straight up and to the left.
Blue moonbeams are causing trouble. Bounce them away with a magic bubble.
translation.es: Los rayos de luna causan problemas Burbuja mágica, desvíalos

translation.en: We did it! Yay!
Oh, bats!
We're sorry, Lobo.
The blue moon's magic is just too strong.
translation.es: La magia de la luna es muy fuerte.

translation.en: Thanks for trying, you guys. But it's no use.
translation.es: Gracias por intentar, pero no hay caso.

translation.en: Maybe we should just have the concert tomorrow night.
Everyone's already on their way here.
If we don't do it tonight, it won't be a Blue Moon concert.
translation.es: Y si lo posponemos, no será de luna azul.

translation.en: I really love the Blue Moon.
translation.es: Y me encanta la luna azul.

translation.en: I just wish its magic didn't ruin my singing.
translation.es: Ojalá su magia no arruinara mi canto.

translation.en: Maybe you can find a way to use its magic.
translation.es: Quizá puedas hallar la forma de usar su magia.

translation.en: I bet there's a song that would sound really good with werewolf howls.
translation.es: Seguro de que hay una canción que suene muy bien con aullidos.

translation.en: Frankie, that's a great idea! I know the perfect song.
translation.es: ¡Frankie, qué buena idea! Conozco la canción perfecta.

translation.en: This is my family songbook.
It's filled with all kinds of great stuff.
Including...this one!
What do you think, Victoria?
It's a great idea.
I'm really looking forward to this concert.
Me too! A Blue Moon, a magical organ,
translation.es: Yo también. Una luna azul, un órgano mágico, y monstruitos cantando y bailando.

translation.en: and little monsters singing and dancing! I can't wait.
translation.es: Una luna azul, un órgano mágico, y monstruitos cantando y bailando. ¡Que empiece!

translation.en: Welcome everybody. And a happy Blue Moon to one and all!
translation.es: Bienvenidos y feliz Luna Azul para todos.

translation.en: Tonight, we have something extra special for you.
translation.es: Tenemos algo extraespecial esta noche para ustedes.

translation.en: - - Take it away, Victoria.
Jorge, where's Lobo?
♪ Sometimes a monster stubs their paw ♪
translation.es: A veces te golpeas una garra

translation.en: ♪ Bumps their head or breaks a claw ♪
translation.es: La cabeza o rompes una garra

translation.en: ♪ Anytime you get a monster ow ♪ ♪ Ow ♪
♪ It's OK to say Ow, ow, ow ♪
♪ It's OK to say Ow, ow, ow ♪
♪ You might get an ow on a wing ♪
translation.es: Quizá tengas nana en un ala

translation.en: ♪ Accidents happen, it's no big thing ♪
♪ Anytime you get a monster ouch ♪ ♪ Ow ♪
♪ It's OK to say Ow, ow, ow ♪
♪ It's OK to say Ow, ow, ow ♪
♪ Boo- boos happen to everyone ♪
♪ Something that's a little bit bad ♪
♪ It's something that's a whole Lot of monster fun ♪
♪ You fall when you jump Ow, ow, ow ♪
♪ You get an itty bitty bump Ow, ow, ow ♪
♪ You get bumped by a ball Ow, ow, ow ♪
♪ You can't help it at all Ow, ow, ow ♪
♪ Anytime you get a monster ouch It's OK to say ♪
translation.es: Cada vez que sientas dolor Puedes decir...

translation.en: I never knew Lobo could howl like that. Jorge, you must be so proud.
translation.es: ¡No sabía que Lobo podía aullar así! Jorge, qué orgullo.

translation.en: Such a big set of pipes on such a little wolf boy!
translation.es: Qué buenos pulmones tiene este lobito.

translation.en: It was wonderful!
Thank you, Luigi.
We could never have done it without everyone working together.
translation.es: Jamás lo hubiéramos hecho sin trabajar juntos.

translation.en: Sun up! Super Monsters!
Great job tonight, Lobo.
You really made the concert a howling success!
Dad! Argh!
How about just one more?
Thanks, Victoria. That was fun.
It sure was.
Now... Who's ready to turn this dance party into a garden party?
translation.es: ¿Quién quiere convertir esta fiesta de baile en una de jardín?

translation.en: A garden party?
Yes. A garden party is when we all work together
translation.es: ¿Una de jardín? Trabajamos todos juntos para cuidar nuestro jardín de noche.

translation.en: to take care of our night garden.
translation.es: Trabajamos todos juntos para cuidar nuestro jardín de noche.

translation.en: I can use my plant magic to help.
Well, Super Monsters, what are we waiting for?
Let's get the party started!
What's that, Victoria?
You have something you want to give to the Super Monsters?
Something for their garden?
Goodness. What could this be?
I can't wait to plant our snapdragon seeds.
I can't wait to harvest some delicious green beans.
translation.es: Y yo, cosechar unas habichuelas deliciosas.

translation.en: Kiddoes, you won't have to wait much longer.
translation.es: Bien, niños, no habrá que esperar mucho.

translation.en: Sun down.
Monsters up!
Drac!
Katya.
Lobo!
Zoe!
Frankie!
Cleo!
Spike!
Vida!
Super Monsters!
Oh, it's beautiful!
It's going to be so fun to use my plant magic to help this garden grow.
translation.es: ¡Será divertido usar mi magia para ayudar a este jardín!

translation.en: We all love using our monster powers in the night garden.
translation.es: Nos encanta usar nuestros poderes en este jardín.

translation.en: Come on and I'll show you.
We're going to have lots of green beans for snack time tonight.
translation.es: Habrá muchos bocadillos de habichuelas esta noche.

translation.en: But picking all these beans will take forever.
translation.es: Pero nos llevará mucho recogerlas todas.

translation.en: Let me help you.
Well, I guess we're done gardening.
But I was having so much fun!
Spike, since we're done in the garden, maybe it's time to go...
translation.es: Spike, ya que terminamos aquí, quizá es hora de...

translation.en: Dragon sailing!
I wonder what color these snapdragons will be?
Guessing the colors is my favorite part.
Mine too. I can hardly wait. You don't have to wait.
translation.es: - A mí también. Ya quiero verlos. - Y podrán.

translation.en: They're blue.
They sure are pretty.
And really snappy!
I didn't even have time to guess the colors.
translation.es: No llegué a adivinar los colores.

translation.en: I'm happy I could help.
Vida! Wait up!
Some water for you. And some for you.
translation.es: Agua para ti. Para ti. Y para ti.

translation.en: And for you.
Wow, Drac! Did your vampire moves do that?
translation.es: Vaya. ¿Tus movimientos de vampiro hicieron eso?

translation.en: That was me. I used my plant magic. You're welcome.
translation.es: Fui yo. Usé mi magia. De nada.

translation.en: Ah... Thank you?
Hi little guy.
I brought some things to help you grow. Big and strong. Like me!
translation.es: ¡Traje cosas para ayudarte a crecer grande y fuerte como yo!

translation.en: What are you doing, Frankie?
It can't stand up on its own yet.
translation.es: No se puede sostener solo aún.

translation.en: You're tying it to those stakes so it won't fall over?
translation.es: ¿Lo atas a esos palos para sujetarlo?

translation.en: Got it! Oops.
I can help with that.
There. Now it doesn't need those stakes to hold it up.
Wow. I kind of wanted to be the one to help it grow.
What else can I do to help?
I don't think there is anything else left to do.
translation.es: Creo que no quedó nada más.

translation.en: We're done already? But I was having so much fun.
I think gardening night is over.
I guess I'll go put these back.
Igor, I thought Super Monsters liked working in the garden.
translation.es: ¿Igor? Creí que a ellos les gustaba trabajar aquí.

translation.en: They certainly do.
So why does everyone seem so sad?
Well, Vida, part of the fun of having a night garden is sharing the work with others.
translation.es: Vida, en parte, lo divertido de esta noche es compartir el trabajo.

translation.en: Each Monster gets to use their unique skills and powers
translation.es: Cada monstruo usa sus habilidades y poderes únicos

translation.en: to help the garden grown.
Oh, no! I was having so much fun using my monster magic
translation.es: ¡Ay, no! Me divertía tanto usando mi magia,

translation.en: that I didn't let anyone else use theirs.
translation.es: que no dejé que usaran la suya.

translation.en: You guys, I'm really sorry.
I got so excited, I forgot to share.
It's OK, Vida. I get super excited about using my powers too.
translation.es: Tranquila, yo me superentusiasmo por usar mis poderes también.

translation.en: Me too. And me three. All the time.
translation.es: - Yo también. - Somos tres. Todo el tiempo.

translation.en: We all do.
Next time we work in the garden, I promise I'll share with everyone.
translation.es: La próxima vez, prometo compartir con todos.

translation.en: Super Monsters, I have a special seed that needs your help.
translation.es: Supermonstruos, tengo una semilla especial para ustedes.

translation.en: Take a look.
- Ah! -
Victoria asked me to give this to you.
She said it needs a special kind of monster magic to make it grow.
translation.es: Dijo que precisa una magia especial para crecer.

translation.en: I've never seen anything like it. I wonder what it is?
But you know everything.
Actually, there are a lot of things I don't know!
translation.es: Hay muchas cosas que no sé.

translation.en: But that doesn't mean I can't learn.
I'll go check my books and see what I can find out.
translation.es: Revisaré mis libros a ver qué encuentro.

translation.en: I'll go ask Victoria if there's anything else she can tell me about this seed.
translation.es: Le preguntaré a Victoria si sabe algo más de la semilla.

translation.en: While I do that, why don't you try using your monster powers to get it to grow?
translation.es: Mientras, ¿por qué no usan sus poderes para que crezca?

translation.en: I can use my plant magic to... oh.
Maybe it's someone else's turn to use their powers?
It's monster magic time.
translation.es: Es la hora mágica de los monstruos.

translation.en: Shiny seed that brightly glows. Now it's time to see you grow!
translation.es: Semilla que brillas bien Es hora de verte crecer bien

translation.en: Oh. Let me try again.
Glowing seed so very small. Time to grow up big and tall.
translation.es: Pequeña semilla brillante Hora de crecer gigante

translation.en: If a witch's spell won't work, maybe it needs a little zombie power!
translation.es: Si no funciona un hechizo, quizá precisa poder zombi.

translation.en: Maybe it just needs a little water.
I've got it. Spike, do you know where Phoebe is?
Sure. She's over there playing in the trees. Why?
translation.es: Sí, allí, jugando en los árboles. ¿Por?

translation.en: Some plants need sunlight to grow instead of moonlight.
translation.es: Algunas plantas precisan luz de sol para crecer.

translation.en: Maybe Phoebe's sunlight can help.
Wow! You think of everything, Cleo.
Oh, Phoebe! Phoebe!
Phoebe, we need your help to grow this seed.
translation.es: Phoebe, precisamos tu ayuda con una semilla.

translation.en: That is one stubborn seed.
Vida, you should try using your plant magic.
Are you sure? You and Drac haven't had a turn yet.
translation.es: ¿Seguro? Tú y Drac no probaron aún.

translation.en: My vampire moves are awesome,
but I don't think that's what this seed needs.
translation.es: pero no creo que necesite eso.

translation.en: OK. I'll try.
Let me try again.
This is awesome!
Even my moves have moves.
Mummy power! Time to fly.
Hey, Frankie. Do you want a lift?
Thanks, Spike, but I've got this.
Mega size!
Oh, no! I broke it.
Poor little seed.
Now it can never grow in our night garden.
translation.es: Jamás crecerá en nuestro jardín de noche.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I ruined everything.
It's OK, Frankie. It was an accident.
Frankie, the seed isn't broken!
Vida's right. Look. It's growing!
I found it. It's called the impossible seed
translation.es: ¡Lo hallé! Se llama la semilla imposible

translation.en: because it's almost impossible to make it grow.
translation.es: porque es casi imposible hacerla crecer.

translation.en: This book says that this seed needs a witch's spell and a zombie's touch to make it grow.
translation.es: Aquí dice que precisa un hechizo especial y un toque zombi para crecer.

translation.en: This says the seed needs to be watered by a werewolf
translation.es: Debe ser regada por un hombre lobo

translation.en: and get sunlight in the nighttime.
translation.es: y recibir luz de sol en la noche.

translation.en: Then the seed has to have a double dose of plant magic.
translation.es: Luego debe recibir una dosis doble de magia vegetal.

translation.en: The last thing it needs is a monster stomp to crack it open.
translation.es: Y, por último, un pisotón monstruoso para abrirse.

translation.en: I don't think any gardeners could do all that.
translation.es: Ningún jardinero podría hacer todo eso.

translation.en: It's beautiful.
Well done, Super Monsters!
You found a way to make the impossible seed grow.
translation.es: Pudieron hacer crecer la semilla imposible.

translation.en: Victoria says she knew you could do it.
translation.es: Victoria dice que sabía que podrían.

translation.en: Anything is possible when we all work together.
translation.es: Todo es posible si trabajamos juntos.

translation.en: Sun up! Super Monsters!
♪ Growing together ♪ ♪ Work and play That's how we get things done ♪
translation.es: Crecemos juntos, trabajamos y jugamos Así hacemos las cosas

translation.en: ♪ La la la la la la Super Monsters ♪
♪ Super Monsters ♪
♪ We're Super Monsters We're human in the daylight ♪
translation.es: Los Supermonstruos Humanos de día somos

translation.en: ♪ We're Super Monsters We become monsters at night ♪
translation.es: Los Supermonstruos Nos convertimos de noche

translation.en: ♪ In Pitchfork Pines we learn And help each other grow ♪
translation.es: En los Pinos aprendemos Y crecemos juntos

translation.en: ♪ There's magic in twilight That's when we start to glow ♪
translation.es: En el crepúsculo empezamos a brillar

translation.en: ♪ Sun down Monsters up! ♪
♪ I'm Drac, flying fast ♪
translation.es: - Drac, vuela rápido - Cleo, poder del viento

translation.en: ♪ Cleo, wind power Spike, dragon clouds ♪
translation.es: - Drac, vuela rápido - Cleo, poder del viento - Spike, nube de dragón - Zoe, visión zombi

translation.en: ♪ Zoe, zombie vision Lobo, super speed ♪
translation.es: - Spike, nube de dragón - Zoe, visión zombi - Lobo, supervelocidad - Katya, poderes mágicos

translation.en: ♪ Katya, magic spells Frankie, stomp ♪
translation.es: - Lobo, supervelocidad - Katya, poderes mágicos ¡Frankie, pisa fuerte!

translation.en: ♪ We're Super Monsters Monsters ♪
